text:
Finfrog | front-end developer and back-end engineer | Paris (France) | REMOTE https://finfrog.fr

Finfrog is a fintech startup providing micro-credits without hassle or paperwork, opening the credit market to people who are often overlooked by bankers (freelance workers for instance).

We are looking for JavaScript developers to contribute the next version of our platform. The front-end is ReactJS-based, and the back-end is built upon Nodejs.

Product quality is our main concern and we use all the available tooling to accomplish this task: flowtype and unit testing everywhere !

contact@finfrog.fr
